thread.section_title: California Casualty Auto and Home Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of California Casualty Auto and Home Insurance | calcas.com | 2 of 27
thread.title: Diann Graham
thread.title_full: California Casualty Auto and Home Insurance reviewed by Diann Graham

author: Diann Graham
title: Diann Graham
text:
I have had you as my auto & house insurance for several years now & am completely satisfied. Recently, my car would't start. Luckily it was in my driveway 3 miles from the dealership I have maintain my car. I called for roadside assistance & within 1/2 hour a tow truck was there to take it to the dealer & again, I was blessed with the trouble being a dead battery got a new one installed & away I went. Lucky me.
Your assistance was efficient & handled with great professionalism. Again, I thank you. I will be relocating to the west coast this summer & plan to keep California Casulty as my insurance.
